The writing between the two tags
is the content that is shown on screen.

Go save that kitten! And watch out -

levels/index.html/hints.portal.message: Este es un portal. ¡Entra para descubrir a donde te lleva!

levels/editing-text.html/hints.edit.message: ¡Oh! Necesitas hacer la plataforma más grande. Presiona el botón 'Editar' o la tecla <kbd>E</kbd> para editar este nivel.

levels/colours.html/tutorial.a.b.message: They've made it impossible to see the path ahead...

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.d.message: Descubrieron algo que les trajo gran felicidad y sentido a sus vidas: unos animales peludos y encantadores.

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.b.message: Pero en el año 345AG (antes de los gatitos), Internet llegó.

levels/headings.html/tutorial.d.a.message: Add a new <h3> tag at the bottom of the code.

levels/creating-elements.html/tutorial.c.message: Click the light bulb whenever you need help! OK

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.c.message: Y toda la humanidad se alegró.

levels/editing-text.html/hints.jump.message: Trata de saltar hacia esta plataforma

levels/editing-text.html/tutorial.e.b.message: You can write anything you want - a limerick about ledges, perhaps?

levels/creating-elements.html/tutorial.b.message: In HTML, a div tag is kind of like a box you can put stuff in.

levels/headings.html/tutorial.e.c.message: Finish it off with a </h3> - remember the /!

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.e.message: Buscaron cada vez más y más en la red: desde pandas gigantes hasta cachorros juguetones.

levels/colours.html/tutorial.d.d.message: And hsl(...) with those three numbers is a special code for a colour.

cutscenes/intro.html/subtitles.j.message: De hecho, los gatitos eran tus únicos amigos.

levels/editing-text.html/tutorial.f.d.message: Press 'Save' to close the editor and rescue the kitten! OK.

levels/headings.html/tutorial.a.e.message: And between you and me, they argue like a fresh bucket of shrews before a steak-off!

levels/colours.html/tutorial.a.d.message: You may not know this, but there are many different coding languages.

levels/headings.html/tutorial.c.a.message: These first two headings didn't get you very far into the cave.

levels/creating-elements.html/tutorial.e.message: Each tag needs to have the same structure as the others.

levels/creating-elements.html/tutorial.f.message: The internet is very picky about this sort of thing...

levels/index.html/title.description: 1st level: title. Arca is the name of the character in the game. I'm not sure if it can or should be translated.
